name: 2Rooms
description:
Fun puzzle platformer!

Play through 14 fun levels as "Frank the Blob" in order to win a mystery prize!

Remember, you can only click on blocks in the same room as you!

In order to get Frank to the end, you need to use both your brain and your platforming skills in order to get keys, get transported, and not die!

Press "Enter" on "New Game" to start!

"W" or space to Jump

"A" to go left

"D" to go right

"R" to restart

Click black boxes to make them fall

Right click signs when they turn white to read them.

Download the .exe file for better graphics!
